== Calculator Spec ==

=== User Story #1 Easy access to advanced functions on different screen sizes ===
As a user I want to have EASY access to advanced calculator's function on tablet and smartphone.

More details:
https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu-calculator-app/+bug/1204109

==== Functional Definition ====
* Method for extend calculator keypad (with addtional keys) on panorama orientation
* Method to access to advanced functions on small screen on portrait orientation

==== Design ====

Standard calculator on smartphone with portrait orientation.
Advanced functions are available by swiping the keypad.
<nowiki>[[File:calculator_on_smartphone_portrait_view.png]]</nowiki><nowiki>[[File:calculator_on_smartphone_with_adv_portrait_view.png]]</nowiki>

Need analysis: If the width/height ratio is different, then some column from advanced functions could be displayed.
<nowiki>[[File:calculator_on_smartphone_with_adv_portrait_view_wider_view.png]]</nowiki>

On tablet with panorama orientation, standard and advanced functions are available in one screen.
<nowiki>[[File:calculator_on_tablet_panorama_orientation.png]]</nowiki>

=== User Story #2 Clipboard ===
As a user I want to copy a previous calculation to paste into an email

More details:
https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu-calculator-app/+bug/1267821

==== Functional Definition ====
* Method for highlighting and selecting a single calculation
* Optional: Method for selecting all previous calculations
